question: Assalamalaykum Mufti Saab,Please interpret my dream.
answer:
QUESTION
Recently I had a dream about getting married. I was very happy on the wedding day. At the wedding there were some problems and the wedding had to be pushed up a week and done sooner than anticipated. I was very nervous because I felt I wouldn't be ready on time. I am 26 and most proposals have fallen through for one reason or another. I rarely have good dreams, and this is the first positive dream I have had about getting married. Is this good or bad? JazakhAllah for your response. May Allah reward you for your help.
ANSWER


Share:
Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) said, 'Good dreams are glad
tidings.'

May Allah Ta'ala make your dream come true, Aameen.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
